### Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [Contributing Guide](../CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] The tool is functional and publicly accessible
- [ ] The URL uses HTTPS
- [ ] The tool is relevant to the LUKSO ecosystem
- [ ] I have tested the changes locally (`npm run dev`)
- [ ] The project builds successfully (`npm run build`)
- [ ] I am the tool creator or have permission to add this tool
